altTitles.ja: エクセル♥サーガ
エクセル・サーガ

description.en:
When discussing conquest, Il Palazzo's motto would most likely be "start small." ACROSS, a group devoted to carrying out and accomplishing the ideals of absent-minded yet bishounen Il Palazzo, feels that the first step in conquering the entire planet would be conquering a single city. This city just so happens to be Fukuoka, where our story takes place.
___
**Official English (Digital):** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/excel-saga)

When the war between the aboveground and underground ended, humanity was joined by so-called "dungeon babies," those gifted with supernatural abilities and an obsession with the labyrinths below ground. 

Despite being a dungeon baby, Kim Jinwoo suppressed his instincts, choosing to live an ordinary life as a guide and caring for his family. 

But when an expedition goes wrong and he somehow ends up becoming the new owner of a labyrinth, he discovers that he cannot ignore his instincts forever...
description.pt-br: Os descendentes da humanidade que nasceram no labirinto e foram criados com o leite dos monstros possuíam uma força especial e corpos fortes. Quando retornaram à Terra, a humanidade os chamou de bebês da masmorra. Entre eles, Kim Jinwoo nasceu no labirinto mais profundo. 'Eu nunca tentei ficar forte, eu só queria viver.' Desde o mais humilde dos escavadores até o rei do labirinto, sua história de vida agora está se revelando.

altTitles.ja: エロティック×アナボリック

description.en: Ageki Kyousuke, a fat guy with a big appetite, has always been interested in Mitsukura Itsuha, a girl who doesn't stand out in his class. He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit! Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!
description.ja: クラスでは目立たない地味な女子高生の三蔵五葉。そんな彼女が無人の屋上で、制服の下に隠していたエロボディをさらけ出している姿を目撃してしまった阿下喜鏡介。こうして奇しくもエロすぎる肉体のヒミツを共有することになった二人が交わした約束とはいったい!?

Pairing: Spain x Romano

Chibimano starts opening up to Spain. Spain's still not quite connected with Romano.

A so·​cial op·​er·​a·​tor 
1. An individual involved in mending the balance of the welfare of human beings in society.
Zuoh Cidio a man with a hanged mans Past answers the call of a troubled high school girl. Together they walk through the horrors of the commonfolk.

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントお嬢様

description.en:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
description.es-la: No me puedo creer que mi Ojou-sama sea tan grande! Fujido Oriko es la exuberante hija del Conglomerado Fujido, un grupo que tiene un monopolio de la industria de máquinas expendedoras en Japón. Y a su lado está su mayordomo personal, el excéntrico Dr. Sebastian. Cuando un monstruo ataca de repente la ciudad, el Dr. Sebastian le da a su ojou-sama una bebida experimental que su equipo de I+D había estado desarrollando. Como resultado, ella crece hasta convertirse en una giganta! Será capaz de aplacar la ira de los invasores o, al menos, mantener intacta su dignidad?

altTitles.ja: さよなら、モラトリアム。

description.en: Mirai met Hotaru, who was also a freshman, at the university he entered. The two became best friends when they attended the same lectures, but Hotaru graduated and got a job. Mirai, on the other hand, has repeatedly stayed in school and spends his days doing nothing. Mirai is kicked out of his parent's house and moves into Hotaru's apartment, but life with Hotaru, who has grown up before him, is not as cordial as it was when they were students... He hates Hotaru now. One day, Mirai can no longer accept the "boring" Hotaru, but something changes when a drunken Hotaru kisses him. He tells himself that it's all Hotaru's fault, and he ends up holding him in his arms.

title.en: The Return of the Legendary Archmage

description.en:
Shin Ha-ryul is the prodigy of modern magical technology and artificial intelligence. However, he's been deemed an outcast for unable to be implanted.

A book appears before him, the magician who has been sentenced to death.

"To the posterity who can hear this voice and has the same constitution as me, I, Rai Bell Vaitener, leave this book."

Along with the book left behind by the legendary great mage, the frozen time of the genius begins to move again.
description.ko:
'이 목소리를 들을 수 있는 나와같은 채질의 후인에게, 나 레이벨 바이테너가 이 책을 남긴다.'

내가 AI 부적합자 라고?

현대 마법 기술의 총아, 인공지능을 이식할 수 없는 부적합자. 도태된 천재 마법사 신하율.

마법사로서 사형 선고를 받은 그의 앞에 한 권의 책이 나타난다.

'이 목소리를 들을 수 있는, 나와 똑같은 체질을 지닌 후인에게, 나 레이 벨 바이테너가 이 책을 남긴다.'

신화 속 대마법사가 남긴 책과 함께, 천재의 멈췄던 시간이 다시 움직이기 시작한다.

altTitles.ja-ro: Yukemuri Sniper

altTitles.ja: 湯けむりスナイパー

description.en: This is the story of a man known only as Gen, who used to be an assassin. Nobody knows his past, his real name or his age, only that he is now working at Tsubakiya, a secluded onsen inn. He had put down his weapons and intended to lead a quiet, peaceful life, but it seems his past is not willing to let him go so easily. The onsen inn gets guests from all walks of life, and anything can happen. Some guests come to end their life. Some guests just want to get away from everyday life and go crazy. There are TV shows and incognito celebrities. Every guest staying at Tsubakiya has their own story, just waiting to unfold.
description.pt-br: Esta é a história de um homem conhecido apenas como Gen, que costumava ser um assassino. Ninguém conhece seu passado, seu verdadeiro nome ou sua idade, acontece que agora ele está trabalhando em Tsubakiya, uma pousada de Onsen isolada. Gen havia largado suas armas e pretendia levar uma vida tranquila e pacífica, mas parece que seu passado não está disposto a deixá-lo ir tão facilmente. A pousada Onsen recebe convidados de todas as esferas da vida, e tudo pode acontecer. Alguns vêm para acabar com suas vidas. Outros só querem ficar longe da vida cotidiana e esbanjar. Cada hóspede em Tsubakiya tem sua própria história, apenas esperando para se desenrolar.‎

description.en: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.
description.ja: 陰キャな清己が忘れ物を取りに戻った放課後の教室。ギャルで有名な南條さんと男子生徒が、○○○しようとしているところを目撃する。逃げ出した男子生徒の代わりに…と誘われるものの、潔癖症の清己はきっぱり断ることに。けれど、それによって興味を持たれてしまい、清己は南條さんに付きまとわれることに！けれど、南條さんは、意外とオタクにとっての理想のギャルで…!?
description.pt-br: Do pior encontro deles surge uma história sobre sua felicidade final! Esta comédia romântica explora os altos e baixos de um relacionamento sério.

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ja: 覗いてはいけない、だから、覗きたい。　この先輩は…女性？　男性？　中性？　魔性??　好奇心という不治の病を患う転校生が出会ったのは、美しく、可愛らしく、格好よく、恐ろしい、謎の存在（ヒト）だった。
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

altTitles.ja: 裏世界ピクニック

altTitles.vi: Dã ngoại nơi mặt sau của thế giới

description.en: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
description.ja: ネット上で実話怪談として語られる存在が出現する、この現実と隣り合わせで謎だらけの<裏世界>。研究とお金稼ぎ、そして大切な人を捜すため、鳥子と空魚は非日常へと足を踏み入れる。女子ふたり怪異探検サバイバル!!
description.ru: Сюжет разворачивается в современном мире, но в нем существуют двери, которые пропускают людей "на другую сторону", где оживают городские легенды и странные истории из Интернета. Студентка колледжа Сораво Камикоши находит одну из таких дверей и идет исследовать Потусторонье. Она почти погибает, когда ее спасает Торико Нишина. Торико - загадочная девушка, которая умело обращается с ружьем и кого-то ищет в Потусторонье. Вместе они начинают исследовать мир за дверями.

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.ja: マーメイドメロディー　ぴちぴちピッチ
ぴちぴちピッチ

description.en: Lucia is the new girl at school. She and her sister run a public bath that's all the rage. When Lucia meets a terrific-looking surfer boy, there's just one little problem: Lucia is a mermaid – not just any mermaid, but a princess on an important mission to save the seven seas from an evil force bent on taking control of the marine world. Such a responsibility doesn't leave much time for romance. But Lucia vows to protect her world and win the heart of handsome Kaito.

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

Tyson's on a mission to be the best Beyblader ever! But his enemies, the Blade Sharks, are super tough and they'll do anything to win! Tyson just ight have what it takes to win when he busts out with a new Beyblade given to him by a mysterious stranger. altTitles.es-la: Деятельность Бога в мире без богов

description.en: Yukito, the son of a questionable cult leader, lost his life due to the cult's ridiculous training practices. Now to his surprise, he was reincarnated into another world! It was an ideal world for him without the concept of "God" or "religion" BUT...!
description.es:
El hijo del fundador de un sospechoso culto, Yukito, pierde la vida por culpa del insensato entrenamiento del culto, pero para su sorpresa, ¡se reencarna en otro mundo!
Era un mundo ideal para él, donde no existía el concepto de "Dios" o "religión"... ¡pero!

Comienza la aventura de una singular "reencarnación en otro mundo" que crea una "religión" en un mundo sin Dios.
description.id:
Yukito, putra seorang pemimpin sekte yang dipertanyakan, kehilangan nyawanya karena praktik pelatihan sekte yang konyol. Sekarang yang mengejutkannya, dia bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain!
Itu adalah dunia yang ideal baginya tanpa konsep "Tuhan" atau "agama" TAPI...!

Petualangan unik "bereinkarnasi di dunia lain" dimulai: menciptakan "agama" di dunia tanpa Tuhan?!
description.ja:
怪しげなカルト宗教の教祖の息子・征人は、教団の無茶な修行で命を落とした――はずが、なんと流行りの異世界転生！
そこは「神」や「宗教」の概念のない、征人にとっては理想の世界だった…が!?
神無き世界で「宗教」を作る異色の“異世界転生”譚、開幕!!
description.ru: Отец Юкито — лидер религиозной секты, который совершил обряд над своим сыном под названием «церемония рождения». Всё ради нового лидера религиозной секты, Юкито! Но что-то пошло не так, и в конце-концов наш герой перерождается в другом мире, где нет таких понятий как: Бог и религия, — а порнографические книги сродни детским каракулям. По мере событий Юкито понимает, что на самом деле в этом мире людскую жизнь и смерть решает империя...
description.es-la: Yukito, el hijo de un sospechoso líder de una secta, pierde la vida durante el peligroso rito de la secta y reencarna en otro mundo. Allí, es salvado por los habitantes de una remota aldea y vive felizmente con ellos. Sin embargo, la aldea es un lugar para aquellos que han sido calificados como "anormales" por el Estado Imperial. Los "anormales" son aquellos que tienen "miedo a la muerte". La gente del Reino Imperial carecía del sentido del "miedo a la muerte". Finalmente, los "anormales" iban a ser ejecutados bajo el sistema de "Condena". Yukito intenta desesperadamente salvar a los habitantes de la aldea, pero es incapaz de hacerlo. En ese momento, "Mitama", el dios del culto del que formaba parte Yukito, es convocado a este otro mundo... ¿Será capaz Yukito de sobrevivir en este otro mundo?
description.pt-br: Yukito, filho de um líder de culto questionável, perdeu a vida devido às práticas ridículas de treinamento do culto. Agora, para sua surpresa, ele reencarnou em outro mundo! Era um mundo ideal para ele sem o conceito de "Deus" ou "religião" MAS...! Uma aventura única de "reencarnação em outro mundo" começa: criar uma "religião" em um mundo sem Deus?!

title.en: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
description.ja: 廃人ゲーマーの会社員“俺”は、やり込んだVRMMO「ダンエク」の世界に転移した。しかし転移先は悪役のデブキャラで!?

altTitles.ja: ブルーピリオド

altTitles.ja-ro: Buru Piriodo

description.de:
Sieh die Welt mit neuen Augen!

Yataro Yaguchi hat gute Noten – aber keine Leidenschaft. Er trinkt, raucht und treibt sich bis nachts in der Stadt herum. Aber glücklich macht ihn das nicht. Und nun, kurz vor dem Schulabschluss, muss er sich fragen, ob das wirklich alles ist, was er vom Leben zu erwarten hat.

Da kommt er durch einen Zufall mit der Malerei in Kontakt – und plötzlich sieht er die Welt mit anderen Augen. Ohne jede Erfahrung beschließt er, sich für eine Kunstakademie zu bewerben. Doch die Aufnahmeprüfung ist hart… und ihm bleibt nicht mehr viel Zeit!
description.en:
Yatora is the perfect high school student, with good grades and lots of friends. It’s an effortless performance, and, ultimately…a dull one. But he wanders into the art room one day, and a lone painting captures his eye, awakening him to a kind of beauty he never knew. Compelled and consumed, he dives in headfirst — and he’s about to learn how savage and unforgiving art can be!

---
- **Won the 13th Manga Taisho Award in 2020**  
- **Won the 44th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2020**
description.es:
Es un estudiante de bachillerato espabilado, popular, que saca muy buenas notas y tiene ideas pragmáticas sobre su futuro. También bebe, fuma y sale de juerga por las noches. Y un día, de repente, descubre el gozo de dibujar.

¡Esta es la historia de superación de Yatora Yaguchi, repleta de vicisitudes en su camino para aprobar el examen de ingreso a una universidad de arte, en una versión de la tenacidad deportiva aplicada a las bellas artes!
description.fr:
Yatora est un lycéen studieux à qui tout réussit. Pourtant, il ressent depuis toujours une impression de vide en lui. Jusqu’au jour où, par hasard, il tombe sur un tableau qui le subjugue littéralement… Très vite, Yatora réalise que peindre est le seul moyen de faire passer ses émotions et de se révéler. Cet événement le pousse à se livrer corps et âme à la peinture pour tenter le concours d’entrée de la plus sélective des écoles de Beaux-arts !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.it:
Un liceale dalla vita piena, che prende buoni voti, sa sempre come cavarsela, beve, fuma e ama la vita notturna... un bel giorno, sente dentro di sè risvegliarsi la passione per il disegno. Inizia così la storia di un ragazzo che farà ardere la propria gioventù, aspirando a entrare in un'università d'arte!

Prima tiratura con in regalo il Quaderno d'artista.
description.ja: 成績優秀かつスクールカースト上位の充実した毎日を送りつつ、どこか空虚な焦燥感を感じて生きる高校生・矢口八虎（やぐち　やとら）は、ある日、一枚の絵に心奪われる。その衝撃は八虎を駆り立て、美しくも厳しい美術の世界へ身を投じていく。美術のノウハウうんちく満載、美大を目指して青春を燃やすスポ根受験物語、八虎と仲間たちは「好きなこと」を支えに未来を目指す！
description.pl:
Ma doskonałe stopnie i świetnie radzi sobie w życiu towarzyskim. Czasami pije, pali i bawi się do białego rana. Jest popularny. Nie można sobie wyobrazić lepszych doświadczeń w liceum, więc dlaczego ktoś taki nagle zapałał miłością do sztuki?!

Oto początek opowieści o młodym, przepełnionym pasją chłopaku, który celuje w uniwersytet sztuki, i jego walecznych przygotowaniach do egzaminów wstępnych na studia!
description.pt: Excelentes notas e sociável. Por que esse estudante colegial popular que ama beber, fumar e sair à noite e parecia estar satisfeito com sua vida despertou para a alegria de pintar? A história de um jovem vestibulando que está dando tudo de si para entrar na Universidade de Artes começa aqui!
description.ru:
Можно ли увлечься чем-то настолько, что ради этого вдруг решишь свернуть с намеченного ранее жизненного пути? Если вдруг поймешь, что выбранная до этого дорога, хоть и сулила благополучие в будущем, но не отражала истинного желания?  
С виду безалаберный Ятора Ягути на удивление своих друзей-разгильдяев преуспел в учёбе и по окончании школы мог поступить почти в любой университет. Однако сам парень большой радости от этого не испытывал. Велика задача — подтянуть предметы, нужно только приложить немного больше усилий, чем остальные. Скучно. Да и по мнению парня, гордиться тут нечем…  
Жгучая потребность в самореализации и отсутствие очевидного способа самовыражения так и довлели бы над Яторой, если бы однажды вечером пагубная привычка не привела его в школьный клуб изобразительного искусства. Увидев там картину Мори, он решает попробовать запечатлеть на холсте приглянувшийся ему городской пейзаж. Неумелая, нелепая, но старательно написанная картина всё же достигает сердец некоторых людей, и парень понимает, что таким образом, через искусство, может по-настоящему общаться с другими.  
Так стоит ли ради этого сворачивать с намеченного пути, даже если, вполне возможно, эта другая дорога в конце концов приведёт к пропасти?
description.th:
คะแนนสอบเป็นเลิศ มนุษยสัมพันธ์กับใครรอบข้างก็ไปได้ดี กินเหล้า สูบบุหรี่ เที่ยวกลางคืนทำได้ทุกอย่าง เพื่อนๆ ต่างก็สนิทสนมเชื่อใจ เขาเป็นเด็กผู้ชายในวัยม.ปลายที่ชีวิตดูกำลังไปได้สวยคนหนึ่ง

ทว่ามาวันหนึ่งเขากลับเพิ่งรู้ตัว่า ตนเองนั้นชอบวาดภาพ!?

สุดยอดมังงะที่ตีแผ่เรื่องราวของเหล่าคนที่มุ่งมั่นในการสอบเข้ามหา'ลัยศิลปะ เปี่ยมล้นไปด้วยพลังของช่วงชีวิตวัยรุ่นเปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!
description.tr:
Lisenin sondan bir önceki sınıfında, çalışkan ama isteksiz Yatora Yaguchi, kendini sanat ile keşfediyor. Daha önce deneyimi olmamasıyla birlikte, bir sanat üniversitesine girmek için çalışmaya başlıyor. Fakat bu seçimin korkunç sonuçları da olabilir.

- 2020 13. Manga Taisho Ödülleri kazananı.  
- 2020 44. Kodansha Manga Ödülleri "En İyi Manga" ödülü kazananı.
description.uk: Під час другого року старшої школи безпристрасний, але дуже старанний учень Ягучі Ятаро нарешті знаходить своє покликання у мистецтві. Не маючи досвіду у цій сфері, він приймає рішення плідно працювати, щоб вступити до університету мистецтв. Рішення з потенціально катастрофічними наслідками.
description.pt-br:
Em seu segundo ano do ensino médio, o desapaixonado mas estudioso, Yataro Yaguchi finalmente se encontra em arte. Sem nenhuma experiencia anterior em arte, ele decide trabalhar com o objetivo de ingressar em uma universidade de arte. Uma decisão com resultados potencialmente desastrosos.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 6, Cap 25. ]
description.zh-hk: 矢口八虎雖然像個不良少年，愛喝酒抽菸和朋友打混，但在學校卻是個成績優異、深受歡迎的學生，然而他卻對這種空虛無趣的生活感到焦躁。某一天在美術社中，看見學姊美麗的油畫，以及美術老師那番建言，讓他決心想嘗試畫畫這條路。在作畫的過程中，也重新發現自我，從中找到人生的意義與目標，就此開啟了考美術大學的努力之路。

altTitles.ja: 勇者が帰ってきた

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

김민수에게 복수를 하겠다는 일념 하나로 이세계를 구한 용사, 박정수.
그는 스스로는 구했지만, 세계를 구하지 못했고, 자신의 세상을 멸망시킨 용사들을 죽이기로 마음 먹는다.

이 이야기는 해피 엔딩 따윈 없는 차가운 현실, 용사들을 죽이는 용사에 대한 이야기이다.

किम मिन-सू, एक हिरो, जसले घर फर्कने एकल सोचको साथ अर्को विश्व बचायो। उसले संसार बचायो, तर आफैंलाई बचाउन सकेन, र संसारलाई नष्ट गर्ने निर्णय गर्यो। यो कथा हिरोको अन्तिम क्षणहरुको बारेमा हो, एक चिसो वास्तविकता जसको कुनै राम्रो अन्त्य छैन

description.ru:
Пак Чон Су, герой, что спас мир только по одной причине - вернуться и отомстить Ким Мин Су.
Он спасся сам, но не смог спасти тех, кто были всем его миром. Пак Чон Су намерен уничтожить того, кто сотворил с ним это.

История без счастливого конца. Пробирающая до костей реальность, в которой герой убивает себе подобных.

description.th:
พัคจองซู นักรบผู้กอบกู้อีกโลกหนึ่งได้ย้อนคืนกลับสู่โลกเดิมเพื่อแก้แค้น คิมมินซู นักรบผู้ฆ่าครอบครัวของเขา นี่คือเรื่องราวของนักรบที่ปราศจากตอนจบแสนสุข เพราะมันคือการห่ำหั่นนักรบด้วยกันเอง!

description.zh:
被黑化勇士们毁灭的世界，
绝望之中最后的勇士归来！
经历千辛万苦最终回到地球的勇士金闵洙，可等他的却是人们冰冷的眼光和父母双亡的事实，绝望的他决定毁灭整个世界。男主朴正秀的家人也被陷入到了这场灾难之中…就在这时，朴正秀也被传送到了异世！勇士朴正秀能否拯救这个世界呢？

description.pt-br:
Após salvar um mundo, o guerreiro Kim Minsu retorna à Terra apenas para descobrir que perdeu tudo… então ele decide destruir o mundo que costumava chamar de lar.

Em sua fúria, ele mata o adolescente Jeongsu Park e sua família. Mas, em vez de morrer normalmente, Jeongsu é transportado para outro mundo, onde descobre que agora é um guerreiro. Depois de matar o rei demônio desse mundo alternativo e aperfeiçoar suas habilidades como guerreiro, Jeongsu retorna à Terra, determinado a se vingar de Minsu.

Enquanto os dois guerreiros lutam com o destino do país em jogo, quem sairá vitorioso?
description.zh-hk:
為了報仇雪恨這唯一念頭而拯救異世界的勇士，雖然拯救了自己，卻拯救不了原本世界的他，決心要殺光毀滅世界的勇士們。 這是關於沒有幸福結局的冷酷現實，以及殺勇者們的勇者的故事。

title.en: You Like Me, Not My Daughter?!

altTitles.ja: 娘じゃなくて私が好きなの!?
娘じゃなくて私(ママ)が好きなの!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Musume Janakute Mama ga Suki nano!?
Musume ja Nakute Mama ga Suki nano!?
Musume Janakute Watashi (Mama) ga Suki nano!?

altTitles.en: You Like Me (Mama), Not My Daughter!?

altTitles.zh: 喜欢的不是女儿而是我吗？

altTitles.pt-br: Você Gosta É De Mim (Mamãe) E Não Da Minha Filha?!

altTitles.ja: ママ好き

altTitles.ja-ro: MamaSuki

description.en:
“I will take in and raise this child.”

I'm Katsuragi Ayako, thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend, Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy, so I'm all for it.

Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like “Please give me your daughter.”? No way, I'm getting ahead of myself.

“Ayako-mama…… I've always loved you. Please go out with me.”

“……You like me (mama), not my daughter!?”

A super pure-love romcom where long-held feelings explode!
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)

**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Animal Web](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)
description.pt-br: Esta é uma comédia romântica estrelada por uma mulher adulta de 30 anos chamada Ayako, que é confessada por um homem 10 anos mais novo dela, o estudante universitário de 20 anos, Takumi … Um homem que ela conhece como o menino "Ta-kun" que mora ao lado e que ensina sua filha adotiva desde os 10 anos. A revelação a espanta, pois ela pensava que sua filha Miu e ele eram um casal.

title.en: Isekai de Mizu no Dai Seirei Yattemasu

altTitles.ja: 異世界で水の大精霊やってます。

description.en: When the laid-back high school student Saejima Nagi wakes up from a nap, he finds himself in a lake in another world!? After learning that he is the "Great Water Spirit" whose essence is the lake, Nagi uses the power that resides within him to heal those suffering from injuries and illnesses. One day, Nagi is led by a voice calling for help and is summoned by a boy. This encounter will greatly change Nagi's fate...
description.ja: のんびり屋の高校生・冴島凪（サエジマ ナギ）が居眠りから目覚めると、異世界の湖になっていた!? 自分が湖を本体とする「水の大精霊」であると知ったナギは、怪我や病で苦しむ者たちを自らに宿る力で癒していく。ある日、ナギは助けを求める声に導かれ、ひとりの少年に召喚される。その出会いが、ナギの運命を大きく変えることになり――。

description.en: Welcome to Wellenberg, Meuracevia at the turn of the 19th century. The fate of Serenity Hotel, an opulent hotel in the nation’s capital, hangs by a thread as its headstrong heiress Serena and her stern husband Eiser struggle to turn its fortune around. Their loveless marriage of convenience takes a twisted turn following Serena’s jealous attachment to her stoic and handsome servant, Frederick. At a time when happiness takes a back seat to one’s sense of duty, will Serena be able to protect her love and ensure the survival of her family and her business?

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

description.en:
Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself. The only problem? Mimori’s skills are abysmal at best, and he’s banished to a deadly dungeon. But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he’s become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
___
**Compositor:** [Uchiuchi Keyaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3b71274c-d84b-4505-bed0-1ee2adda188f)
**Character Designer:** [KWKM](https://mangadex.org/author/d7705978-2785-490d-8292-71738dc20ef3)
description.ja:
学校では“空気モブ”な高校生・三森灯火は、クラスメイトとともに勇者として異世界に召喚された。しかし、次々と周りがＳ級やＡ級の才覚を見出される中、〝廃棄対象〟となるＥ級の才能しかないと宣告されてしまう。救済を求める彼にクラスメイトが向けたのは蔑みの眼差しで……。そして、召喚主の女神ヴィシスにより生存者ゼロの遺跡に廃棄される。絶望に満ちた奈落の底で煮えたぎる復讐心を抱えた少年は、ハズレ枠と誹られた【状態異常スキル】で魔物を蹂躙する！

「何をしても生き残る――クソ女神に一発くれてやるまでは」
description.pt:
Durante a viagem escolar Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. Assim, o personagem secundário e herói abandonado, se tornara o mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.


---
description.vi: Mimori Touka - Một học sinh cao trung với lối sống “quần chúng không khí”. Trong chuyến học dã ngoại của trường, Touka và các bạn cùng lớp bất ngờ bị Nữ Thần triệu hồi đến dị giới. Quá trình đánh giá năng lực theo hạng S, A, B, C, D đã được tiến hành và chuyện hiếm thấy là lần triệu hồi này quá nhiều người hùng cấp S tối thượng với cấp A ưu tú cùng quy tụ. Thêm vào đó, chỉ duy nhất Touka xếp hạng yếu kém - Người hùng cấp E có chỉ số trạng thái siêu thấp so với các bạn cùng lớp. Chưa kể kỹ năng cá nhân [Trạng Thái Dị Thường] của Touka còn vượt xa cái mốc thất bại toàn tập nơi dị giới khiến cậu bị “loại bỏ”. Trải qua bao thăng trầm đấu tranh giành giật sự sống, cậu quyết tâm trở thành ác quỷ để bắt đầu hành trình báo thù Nữ Thần.
description.pt-br: Durante a viagem escolar, Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank E – um status extremamente baixo comparado a seus colegas de classe. Assim, o herói abandonado se tornará absolutamente o demônio mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.

description.en:
*"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"*   
  
The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!
description.es:
"¡Lo sé! ¡Destruiré a algunos humanos para matar el tiempo!"

¡El demonio más fuerte de todos los tiempos hace una aparición inesperada! Pero es... ¡una cabeza hueca total! ¡Comienza una comedia sobre un demonio torpe pero émulo que intenta matar el tiempo!
description.ja: 「暇つぶしに人間でも滅ぼすかのう！」突如として現れた、史上最強の悪魔！でもコイツ...チョロすぎ!?ポンコツだけど負けず嫌いな悪魔と繰り広げる暇つぶしコメディー、開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды в комнату Рокуро неожиданно заявился сильнейший в мире демон! Но постойте, что же это... Неужто она настолько пустоголовая!? Встречайте великолепную комедийную историю о неуклюжем демоне, пытающимся скоротать время за людскими играми!

title.en: I Thought She Was a Calm Senior...

altTitles.ja: おっとりしている先輩かと思ったら…

altTitles.id: Kukira Dia itu Senpai yang Kalem...

altTitles.es: La caballerosidad de un fracasado caballero

altTitles.fr: Le récit chevaleresque du chevalier échoué

altTitles.ja-ro: Rakudai Kishi no Cavalry

altTitles.en: The Heroic Tales of the Failure Knight

altTitles.ja: 落第騎士の英雄譚

description.en:
There are some humans capable of using magical power to manifest their souls as weapons and control forces beyond normal comprehension. These people are known as Blazers, and those who are recognized as such can undergo training at academies to become Mage-Knights. Ikki Kurogane is an aspiring Mage-Knight, despite being considered the worst student at Hagun Academy as an F-ranked Blazer—the lowest rank possible.  
  
One morning, he accidentally stumbles upon Stella Vermillion, a visiting princess and A-ranked Blazer who has just enrolled at Hagun, in a state of undress. As a result, she challenges him to a duel where the loser will be the winner’s slave. It seems like a surefire win for Stella, but could there be more to Ikki than meets the eye?
description.it:
In un universo alternativo, gli esseri umani dotati di poteri soprannaturali, noti come Blazer, possono manifestare le proprie anime sotto forma di armi chiamate Device. 

Ikki Kurogane, soprannominato da tutti il "Cavaliere Ripetente", un giorno si imbatte in una ragazza seminuda, Stella Vermillion, mentre questi si cambia nella sua stanza. L'incontro fatale inciderà profondamente sulla vita di Ikki, il quale nel frattempo tenterà di raggiungere la vetta del Festival di combattimento delle sette stelle per diventare un vero cavaliere mago. 
Il festival è un evento annuale organizzato dalle sette accademie di cavalieri maghi del Giappone per determinare chi è l'apprendista cavaliere più forte tra le varie scuole. 
Il vincitore diventerà il nuovo "Re Spadaccino delle Sette Stelle", ma gli scontri da affrontare sono all'ultimo sangue e i concorrenti potrebbero addirittura morire.
description.pt-br:
Existem alguns humanos capazes de usar o poder mágico para manifestar suas almas como armas e controlar forças além da compreensão normal.  Essas pessoas são conhecidas como Blazers, e aqueles que são reconhecidos como tal podem passam por treinamento em academias para se tornarem Cavaleiros Mágicos. Ikki Kurogane é um aspirante a Cavaleiro Mago, apesar de ser considerado o pior aluno da Hagun Academy como um Blazer de classificação F - a classificação mais baixa possível.
  
Certa manhã, ele acidentalmente se depara com Stella Vermillion, uma princesa visitante e Blazer de classificação A que acabou de se matricular na Hagun, em estado de nudez. Como resultado, ela o desafia para um duelo onde o perdedor será escravo do vencedor. Parece uma vitória infalível para Stella, mas poderia haver mais em Ikki do que aparenta?

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

altTitles.ja: メダロット ヒカル編

altTitles.ja-ro: Medarot - Hikaru Hen

description.en:
A manga adaptation of the first Medarot game. Created by Horuma Rin, the artist for the game series.   
  
The story follows Hikaru Agata and his medarot, Metabee's adventures.

title.en: Kimi yo de Ato Mou Sukoshi

altTitles.ja: 君よであともう少し

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimiyo de ato mōsukoshi

altTitles.ru: Ещё немного, чтобы дотянуться до тебя

description.en: Haruko is a girl who worries about her height. Sho is a boy who worries about his shortness. Haruko befriends the cheerful Maki, Sho is friends with the caring Kouta. This is a warm and touching story about their youth.
description.ru: Харуко - девочка, переживающая из-за своего высокого роста. Сё - мальчик, переживающий из-за своего низкого роста. Харуко дружит с весёлой Маки, Сё - с заботливым Коутой. Это тёплая и щемящая история об их юности.

altTitles.ja: 最強ドクターリターンズ

description.en:
To survive as someone from a lowly background, I, as a doctor, had to abandon my pride. If I had to bark, I barked, if I had to beg, I begged.

Is this the outcome of the weak?!

When frustration and anger brimmed in both eyes, facing death in a traffic accident.
But when I opened my eyes again, I found myself back as an intern…!

On the outside, a novice doctor in their 20s, but on the inside, a top-tier thoracic surgeon.

The revenge and healing drama of Max Level Doctor Kim Yoon Chan begins.

"From now on, I will take control of every situation!"

altTitles.ru: Великий из Бродячих Псов: Приносящий Шторм

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス STORM BRINGER

altTitles.vi: Văn Hào Lưu Lạc: STORM BRINGER

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス ＳＴＯＲＭ ＢＲＩＮＧＥＲ

description.en: It's been roughly one year since Chūya Nakahara joined the Port Mafia, and he's got his sights set on an executive position. But as he makes plans to move up, a man by the name of Paul Verlaine—claiming to be his older brother—appears and vows to assassinate everyone he cares about! Now, Chūya must team up with Adam, a European A.I. investigator, to stop this lunatic before the storm swallows Yokohama once again…

title.en: Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan: Another Side of the Heroine

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん アナザー・サイド・オブ・ヒロイン

altTitles.ja-ro: Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan Another Side of Heroine

altTitles.en: Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan: Another Facet of the Heroine

description.en: Male to female ratio 1:359!!! Popular harem school romantic comedy! Official spin-off of ‘Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan’ depicting unknown episodes of the heroines that were not depicted in the main story!

title.en: The Legend of the Northern Blade

altTitles.ja: 北剣伝記

description.de:
Jahrzehntelang kämpften die tapferen Krieger der Nördlichen Himmlischen Sekte, um die Welt vor der bösartigen Stillen Nacht zu beschützen. Aber als der Anführer der vierten Generation beschuldigt wird, mit dem Feind gemeinsame Sache zu machen, ist er gezwungen, die Sekte aufzulösen und sich selbst umzubringen, um seinen Sohn Moowon zu beschützen. Ohne verbliebene Familie oder Verbündete lebt Moowon ein trostloses Leben unter ständiger Beobachtung ... bis ein plötzlicher Angriff der Stillen Nacht ihm die Gelegenheit gibt, in die Berge zu fliehen. Dort trainiert der junge Krieger, um die Kampftechniken seiner Vorfahren zu meistern, bevor das mysteriöse Verschwinden einer geliebten Person in zwingt, zurückzukehren. Folge Moowon auf seiner Reise, um den Tod seines Vaters zu rächen und die Bösewichte zu vernichten, die die Welt in Dunkelheit stürzen wollen!

description.en:
When the world was plunged into darkness by the ‘Silent Night’, Martial Artists from all over the place gathered to form the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’. With overwhelming strength from the Northern Heavenly Sect, the Silent Night was pushed away and the people began to enjoy peace once more. However, as time passed the martial artists from the mainlands began to conspire against the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’, and eventually caused the death of the Fourth Generation Sect Leader, Jin Kwan-Ho, destroying the sect with it. As everyone left the sect, Jin Kwan-Ho’s only son, Jin Mu-Won was left behind. Mu-Won has never learned anything about martial arts, but he eventually finds the Martial Techniques secretly left behind by his father and begins to acquire the martial arts of the Northern Heavenly Sect. Then one day, a mysterious girl appears before Mu-Won…!!

description.fr:
Depuis des décénies la secte céleste du nord se bat pour protéger le monde de la démoniaque Nuit Silencieuse. Mais le jour où le chef de la quatrième génération se retrouve accusé par l'alliance céleste d'avoir collaboré avec l'ennemi, il est obligé de dissoudre la secte et de s'ôter la vie pour protéger son fils, Moowon. Laissé seul, sans famille ni alliés, Moowon vit une vie morose, sous haute surveillance... jusqu'au moment où une attaque surprise de la Nuit Silencieuse lui donne une chance de s'échapper dans les montagnes. Là-bas, le jeune guerrier s'entraîne afin de maîtriser les techniques de combat de ses prédecesseurs, jusqu'à ce que la mort d'un être cher le ramène sur ses anciennes terres. Suivez l'histoire de Moowon, dans sa quête d'héroisme et de vengeance, tandis qu'il se bat pour éliminer ceux qui ont trahi son père, et les démons menaçant de plonger le monde dans l'obscurité !

description.ja:
かつて世の中を混乱に陥らせた集団「密夜」を倒すために、武術の達人たちを集めて作られた「北天門」！ その強力な守りの中で密夜は影を潜め、「北天門」は「中原」の平和を代表する集団となった。 しかし次第に「北天門」に対して妬みを持つ者が現れ、四代目門主「秦 虎星」は裏切り者達に囲まれた中、自ら命を絶ってしまう… 皆が去った「北天門」に一人残された虎星の息子、「秦 天翔」。武術に関しては何も知らない幼い少年だったが、人知れず父に伝授された古語によって「北天門」の壁に刻まれた武術を身につけ始める！ そんなある日、「秦 天翔」の前に正体不明の一人の娘が現れたのだが..!!

description.ko:
무협소설의 최강자 우각의 동명 소설 <북검전기>가 만화로 새롭게 태어나다!

세상을 혼란에 빠뜨린 집단 밀야에 맞서기 위해 중원의 고수들이 모여 만들어낸 북천문!
북천문의 강력한 투쟁으로 밀야는 서서히 그 모습을 감추었고, 북천문은 중원을 평화를 대표하는 집단으로서 강력한 위용을 과시하게 되었다.
그러나 평화가 길어지자 중원의 고수들 사이에서는 북천문에 대한 은밀한 시기가 생겨났고, 결국 북천문의 4대 문주인 진관호는 배신자들에게 둘러싸인 채 스스로 목숨을 끊음으로서 파국의 끝을 맞이하게 된다. 
모두가 떠난 북천문에 홀로 남은 진관호의 아들 진무원(13세)은 무공이라고는 손톱만큼도 알지 못 하는 어린 소년. 그러나 남몰래 아버지가 전수한 고어(古語)를 통해 북천문의 벽에 새겨진 무공을 익히기 시작한다. 
그러던 어느날, 진무원의 앞에 정체를 알 수 없는 한 소녀가 나타나게 되는데…!!

description.ru:
Когда мир погрузился во тьму, мастера боевых искусств собрались, чтобы сформировать «Северный небесный клан». Благодаря ей люди снова обрели мир и покой. Однако с течением времени мастера боевых искусств начали строить заговор против «северного небесного клана», который в конечном итоге привел к смерти лидера клана, Джин Кван-Хо, и уничтожению клана вместе с ним. Когда все покинули клан, единственный сын Джин Кван-Хо, Джин Му-Вон, остался в нем. Му-Вон никогда не изучал боевые искусства, но он находит Технику, тайно оставленную его отцом, и начинает изучать боевые искусства Северного Небесного Клана.

description.pt-br: Quando o mundo mergulhou na escuridão pela 'Noite Silenciosa', artistas marciais de todo o lugar se reuniram para formar a 'Seita Celestial do Norte'. Com uma força esmagadora da Seita Celestial do Norte, a Noite Silenciosa foi afastada e o povo começou a desfrutar a paz mais uma vez. No entanto, com o passar do tempo, os artistas marciais do continente começaram a conspirar contra a 'Seita Celestial do Norte' e, eventualmente, causaram a morte do líder da seita da quarta geração, Jin Kwan-Ho, destruindo a seita com ela. Quando todos deixaram a seita, o único filho de Jin Kwan-Ho, Jin Mu-Won, foi deixado para trás. Mu-Won nunca aprendeu nada sobre artes marciais, mas ele finalmente encontra as Técnicas Marciais secretamente deixadas para trás por seu pai e começa a adquirir as artes marciais da Seita Celestial do Norte. Então, um dia...

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)
description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

altTitles.ja: 無双の解体師

description.en: Dungeons have suddenly appeared all over the world. People became "explorers" and dived into dungeons to obtain resources that could only be found there! Kurose Sakuto, too, was searching for the elixir that would heal everything in order to save his childhood friend who was suffering from an incurable disease. However, he receives a notice from his friends that he is no longer a member of the team. In the dungeon and in the real world, he faces off against demons and malicious humans.
description.ja: 地球にダンジョンが出現してから150年。人々は希少な資源を求めてダンジョンへ挑む時代となった。 黒瀬朔斗も、不治の病に侵された幼馴染を助けるため、全てを癒す薬「エリクサー」を求めダンジョンに挑んでいた。 しかし、パーティから追放され、仲間から見捨てられた朔斗は、ダンジョンに挑むことすら難しい状況になってしまう。 幼馴染を助けるため何としてもエリクサーが必要な朔斗は――。

description.en:
Betrayed and killed by his fellow Ninestar guild members, the powerful necromancer Cha Jin-Hyuk resorts to a daring soul transference.

A decade later, he awakens in a new body, devoid of his former powers. With the support of his new comrades, Spirit Master Balkan and hobgoblin Haryu, he embarks on a quest for vengeance, scaling the mysterious tower once again.

Only this time, he possesses the overpowered abilities of an All-Master, enabling him to master all the classes within the tower!
description.fr:
La tour. Un endroit inconnu avec de nombreux changements rapides.

Dix ans plus tard, je me suis réincarné dans le corps d'un garçon qui vit sur Terre, en Corée du Sud.

"Le type qui m'a poignardé dans le dos et celui qui est au-dessus de lui... Je vais leur faire la peau.

" La personne qui a atteint le sommet en tant que nécromancien et a atteint la classe supérieure, le Maître de l'Esprit Cha Jinhyuk. En tant que "All-Master", il prendra sa revanche en grimpant dans la tour en tant que nécromancien.

title.en: Sekai ni Hitori, Zenzokusei Mahou no Tsukaite

altTitles.ja: 世界に一人、全属性魔法の使い手

altTitles.en: The Only in the World, Omnipotent Wizard
The Only Person in the World Able to Use All Magic Attributes

description.en: After a traffic accident, Zenichi Kiyama, a humble office worker, was reincarnated as a baby in a different world called "perfect compatibility". However, the result of his attribute appraisal with crystal was "dark attribute". The worst result is that he is a demon child...! ?
description.id: Setelah kecelakaan lalu lintas, Zenichi Kiyama, seorang pekerja kantoran yang rendah hati, bereinkarnasi sebagai bayi di dunia berbeda yang disebut "kompatibilitas sempurna". Namun, hasil apresiasi atributnya dengan kristal adalah "atribut hitam". .! ?
description.ja: ブラック企業に勤めるサラリーマンの木山全一は交通事故を境に異世界に赤子として転生する。神様曰く、その世界は“相性バッチリ”とのこと。希望に満ちた異世界生活が始まるはずだったが、水晶による属性鑑定を行った結果、魔族の証である《闇属性》を持って産まれたことがわかってしまい…!?

title.en: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

description.en: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

title.en: Makikomarete Isekai Teni suru Yatsu wa, Taitei Cheat

altTitles.ja: 巻き込まれて異世界転移する奴は、大抵チート

altTitles.ko: 휘말려서 이세계 전이하는 녀석은 대개 치트

altTitles.en: Those Who Get Caught Up in Another World are Usually Cheaters
He is a Matchless Warrior in Different-Dimension World!!

description.en:
One day during lunch break, High School student Takanashi Kyousai and four friends are suddenly transported to another world of Swords and Magic. The Princess of the Other World,  who was the Time-Space Magician that summoned them, wants them to be Heroes and defeat the Demon King to save her world. 

While his four friends were taken aback by this sudden turn of events, Kyousai was calm and said, "It's just like a story". However the Princess made a shocking statement: 

"I only summoned four Heroes, didn't I?" 

What fate awaits Kyousai, the man who was accidentally summoned to another world?

---
description.ja: ある日の昼休み、突然 4人の友人とともに剣と魔術の異世界へと転移してしまった男子高校生・小鳥遊強斎。彼らを召喚した時空魔術師である異世界の王女によれば、この世界を救うため「勇者」として魔王を倒して欲しいとのこと。突然のことに面食らう友人 4人をよそに「テンプレじゃん」とひとり余裕の表情の強斎だったが……、ここで王女から驚愕の事実が告げられる!「――勇者様は4人のはずですが?」“間違って異世界に召喚されてしまった男" 強斎の運命やいかに!?

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

title.en: Gaikotsu Kishi-sama, Tadaima Isekai e Odekake-chuu

altTitles.fr: Le Chevalier Squelettique, découvrant un nouveau monde

altTitles.en: Skeleton Knight, going out to the parallel universe

altTitles.th: บันทึกการเดินทางต่างโลกของท่านอัศวินกระดูก

altTitles.ja: 骸骨騎士様、只今異世界へお出掛け中

altTitles.uk: Лицар-Скелет розпочинає пригоду в новому світі

altTitles.zh: 骸骨骑士大人异世界冒险中

altTitles.ja-ro: Gaikotsu Kishi-sama, Tadaima Isekai e o Dekake-chū

altTitles.tr: İskelet Şövalye, Şimdi Başka Bir Dünyaya Gidiyor

altTitles.fr: Le Chevalier squelette, excursion à travers un autre monde

altTitles.ar: فارس الهيكل العظمي في عالم آخر

altTitles.zh-hk: 骸骨騎士大人異世界冒險中

altTitles.pt-br: Skeleton Knight, indo para o universo paralelo

description.en:
The protagonist fell asleep while playing an online game. However, he awoke in a strange world with his game character's appearance. In a state of shock, he noticed that he was equipped with nothing but his strongest weapon and armor. To make matters worse, our hero's appearance was changed by the special avatar skin『Skeleton』when he enter this new world. The protagonist wanted to live without drawing attention, but he got acquainted with the dark elf Ariana and received her request.  
  
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/skeleton-knight-in-another-world-light-novel/)
description.ja: - [Original WebNovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6266ci/)
description.uk: Одного разу головний герой грав у відеогру, поки він не заснув...й коли він прокинувся, опинився в ігровому світі в образі свого аватара, як скелет! Оснащений потужною зброєю та обладунками аватара, але застрягши у страхітливій зовнішності, Арк повинен знайти місце для себе в цьому дивовижному світі. Усі його сподівання на тихе життя розвіюються, коли він зустрічається з прекрасною ельфійкою воїном, після чого вони разом подорожують цим світом.
description.pt-br:
Arc, um jovem jogador, desmaia durante uma partida online e quando desperta se depara em um mundo estranho, muito semelhante ao do jogo. Chocado com o ocorrido, ele percebe que está neste mundo munido de uma armadura e uma poderosa arma, além de poderes e aparência modificada para a de um [Caveiro]. Arc precisa se manter vivo e, para isso, não deve chamar a atenção. Porém, ele acaba encontrando uma elfa chamada Ariana e aceitando o seu pedido.

- [Original WebNovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6266ci/)

title.en: Rettoujin no Maken Tsukai: Skill Board wo Kushi Shite Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Rettoujin no Maken Tsukai: Sukiruboudo o Kushi Shite Saikyou ni Itaru
Rettou Hito no Maken Tsukai: Sukiruboudo wo Kushi Shite Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.ja: 劣等人の魔剣使い　スキルボードを駆使して最強に至る

altTitles.en: Inferior Magic Swordsman: Using the Skill Board to Become the Strongest
Using the Skill Board as an Inferior Magic Swordsman to Become the Strongest
Use the Skill Board to Become the Most Powerful Swordsman

altTitles.th: การใช้สกิลบอร์ด เพื่อเข้าถึงการเป็นผู้ที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดของนักดาบเวทมนตร์ผู้ต่ำต้อย

altTitles.zh: 劣等人魔剑使运用技能板成为最强

altTitles.zh-hk: 劣等人魔劍使　運用技能板成為最強

altTitles.tr: Reenkarnasyon Geçirmiş Alt Tabaka Büyülü Kılıç Ustası

description.en: A normal office worker, Toru Minasuki, was swallowed up by a dimensional fissure and reincarnated into a different world. Upon reincarnation, Toru was given a [skill board] by God. Make the most of it to acquire all the necessary skills! Even though he is an "inferior person," he'll make his way to the top!
description.it: Un normale impiegato, Toru Minasuki, è stato inghiottito da una fessura dimensionale e si è reincarnato in un altro mondo. Dopo la reincarnazione, a Toru viene donata una [skillboard] da Dio. Ne approfitterà per acquisire tutte le abilità necessarie a sopravvivere in questo mondo! Nonostante sia una "lost person".
description.ru: Обычный офисный работник, Тору Мизунори, был поглощен огромной расщелиной и был перерожден в другом мире. После перерождения Бог дал Тору "список навыков". Сделай все возможное, что бы приобрести все нужные навыки! Несмотря на то, что он "слабейший человек", он пробьется к вершине.
description.th: มิซึโนริ โทรุ คนทำงานสำนักงานทั่วไป ถูกกลืนหายไปกับรอยแยกมิติ แล้วมาเกิดใหม่ที่ต่างโลก เมื่อมาเกิดใหม่ โทรุ ได้รับ [สกิลบอร์ด] โดยพระเจ้า ใช้ประโยชน์จากมันให้ได้มากที่สุด เพื่อรับสกิลที่จำเป็นทั้งหมด! แม้ว่าเขาจะเป็น "คนต่ำต้อย" เขาก็จะก้าวไปสู่จุดสูงสุด!
description.tr: Normal bir ofis çalışanı olan Toru Minasuki, boyutsal bir yarık tarafından yutuldu ve farklı bir dünyaya reenkarne oldu. Reenkarnasyonun ardından Toru'ya Tanrı tarafından bir [beceri tablosu] verildi. Gerekli tüm becerileri edinmek için bundan en iyi şekilde yararlanın! "Aşağılık bir insan" olmasına rağmen, zirveye doğru yol alacaktır!
description.pt-br: Um trabalhador assalariado normal, Toru Minasuki, foi engolido por uma fenda dimensional e reencarnou em um mundo cheio de vermes e monstros. Após a reencarnação, Toru recebeu um [Quadro de Habilidades] por uma deusa. Aproveite ao máximo para adquirir todas as habilidades necessárias! Mesmo sendo uma "pessoa inferior", ele chegará ao topo?

description.en:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

description.en: The ruthless criminal “Great,” exiled to space for his countless crimes, is banished to the past alongside the King of the Universe, “Rohollah,” after their encounter in space. Great attempts to right the numerous wrongs he committed in the past to try and rewrite a better future…
description.ru: Преследуемый космосом за неисчисляемые злодеяния безумный преступник Великий после встречи с королём космоса Рохум Рогахой был отправлен в прошлое. Но сможет ли Великий исправить ошибки прошлого и переписать будущее...
